description: Main entry point of a Flutter application for the Pluto Wealth Navigator app. It initializes environment variables, local storage, and sets up app-wide providers and routing.

classes.name: PlutoApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app that sets up multiple providers and MaterialApp configuration.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes environment, storage, and runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: PlutoApp.build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree with providers and MaterialApp configuration.
